fields.name: early_BenefitFactor
fields.description: Benefit multiplier for early retirement

fields.name: early_ReductionRate
fields.description: Annual percentage reduction in retirement benefits for each year preceding the AgeBase, TenureBase, or PointsBase.

fields.name: early_ActuarialReduction
fields.description: Are benefits actuarially reduced for each year prior to the AgeBase, TenureBase, or PointsBase?

fields.name: early_ActuarialReductionInterest
fields.description: Not found in API.

fields.name: early_TotalReduction_check
fields.description: Not found in API.

fields.name: early_RetAge
fields.description: If plan member's age at retirement is X years or greater… (EarlyRetBen_BenefitFactor/EarlyRetBen_ReductionRate/EarlyRetBen_ActuarialReduction)

fields.name: early_RetTenure
fields.description: If plan member's tenure at retirement is X years or greater… (EarlyRetBen_BenefitFactor/EarlyRetBen_ReductionRate/EarlyRetBen_ActuarialReduction)

fields.name: early_RetPoints
fields.description: If plan member's age plus tenure at retirement is X years or greater… (EarlyRetBen_BenefitFactor/EarlyRetBen_ReductionRate/EarlyRetBen_ActuarialReduction)

fields.name: early_RetDate
fields.description: If plan member retires on or after X... (EarlyRetBen_BenefitFactor/EarlyRetBen_ReductionRate/EarlyRetBen_ActuarialReduction)

fields.name: early_AgeBase
fields.description: At retirement, the calculated annual benefit is reduced for each year that plan member's age is below X.

fields.name: early_TenureBase
fields.description: At retirement, the calculated annual benefit is reduced for each year that plan member's tenure is below X.

fields.name: early_PointsBase
fields.description: At retirement, the calculated annual benefit is reduced for each year that the plan member's age plus service is below X.

fields.name: early_NearestAgeBase
fields.description: At retirement, is the calculated annual benefit reduced for each year that the plan member's age is below the nearest normal retirement age?

fields.name: early_SSAgeBase
fields.description: At retirement, is the calculated annual benefit reduced for each year that the plan member's age is below the SS full retirement age?

fields.name: early_ReductionPeriodStart
fields.description: For X or more periods before the AgeBase, TenureBase, or PointsBase… (EarlyRetBen_BenefitFactor/EarlyRetBen_ReductionRate/EarlyRetBen_ActuarialReduction)

fields.name: early_ReductionPeriodEnd
fields.description: For X or less periods before the AgeBase, TenureBase, or PointsBase… (EarlyRetBen_BenefitFactor/EarlyRetBen_ReductionRate/EarlyRetBen_ActuarialReduction)

fields.name: early_StartAge
fields.description: For age X or greater… (EarlyRetBen_BenefitFactor/EarlyRetBen_ReductionRate/EarlyRetBen_ActuarialReduction)

fields.name: early_EndAge
fields.description: For age X or less... (EarlyRetBen_BenefitFactor/EarlyRetBen_ReductionRate/EarlyRetBen_ActuarialReduction)

fields.name: early_TenureStart
fields.description: For years of service X or greater... (EarlyRetBen_BenefitFactor/EarlyRetBen_ReductionRate/EarlyRetBen_ActuarialReduction)

fields.name: early_TenureEnd
fields.description: For years of service X or less... (EarlyRetBen_BenefitFactor/EarlyRetBen_ReductionRate/EarlyRetBen_ActuarialReduction)

fields.name: early_ServiceDateStart
fields.description: For years of service earned as of X or later… (EarlyRetBen_BenefitFactor/EarlyRetBen_ReductionRate/EarlyRetBen_ActuarialReduction)

fields.name: early_ServiceDateEnd
fields.description: For years of service earned as of X or earlier… (EarlyRetBen_BenefitFactor/EarlyRetBen_ReductionRate/EarlyRetBen_ActuarialReduction)
